pages.text: The $(thing)Electric Forge$() is an advanced device used to heat and melt items in a controlled environment.$(br2)Items heat $(thing)2x$() faster in the Electric Forge.$(br2)The Electric Forge does not require a chimney to operate. Furthermore, a $(l:mechanics/bellows)Bellows$() has no effect on the temperature.
The $(thing)Electric Forge$() uses a large amount of $(thing)Purple Steel$(), making it challenging to obtain.

The $(thing)Electric Forge$() has five slots for heating items and one slot for molds or vessels. The forge will also heat devices that are placed above it.$(br2)Click the $(thing)-$() or $(thing)+$() to set the target temperature in increments of 10°; or 100° with $(item)$(k:key.sneak)$().$(br2)The higher the temperature, the more power is consumed.
